snippet.title: Northanda Chronicles - Demo Trailer - Steam
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2068650/

Join our Discord community:
https://discord.gg/hPtFcsaPb4

Step into the mythical world of Northanda as you lead a trio of heroes on a deck-building adventure. Navigate strategic decisions, and harness the combined power of gems, blessings, mysterious artifacts, and more. Confront Chaos face-to-face in a world shaped by myth and magic.

#pcgaming #steam #indiegames #deckbuilding #roguelike #northanda
